label: 授刀舎人寮
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
見出し読み: じゅとうとねりりょう
見出し読み_mod: じゅとうとねりりょう
説明文: A bureau (ryō) in charge of the Imperial Bodyguard (Jutōe ). who were armed soldiers that guarded the Imperial Palace (Kinchū ). Later this became the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards (Konoefu ), and the Jutōe became the Inner Palace Guards (Konoe ). [授刀衛、禁中、近衛府、近衛]
